title: Charles Lawrence Hare, obituary | PenBay Pilot
text: Charles Lawrence Hare, obituary CAMDEN — Charles “Charlie” Lawrence Hare, 62, of Camden, passed away peacefully at the Sussman House in Rockport on December 27, 2023 with his loving family by his side. Charlie was born on January 8, 1961 to Charles Hare and Eleanor (Shute) Hare. Charlie was predeceased by his parents; parents-in-law, Robert and Cris Benner; and baby son, Charles David Hare. Charlie is survived by his wife, Tambra Hare of Camden; sons Robert Charles Hare of Rockland, Zachary John Hare of Warren; daughter, Nychole Marie Hare of Thomaston; granddaughter, Alyce Michelle Hare of Thomaston; brother in-law Robert David Benner of Camden; sister, Eileen Nuppula of Rockland; nieces Kara Rubell of Massachusetts and Erin Benner of Falmouth and nephews Jeremy Nuppula of Union and Taylor Benner of Searsmont. Arrangements are entrusted to Hall’s of Waldoboro. To extend online condolences, light a candle for Charlie or to share a picture or story, please visit Charlie’s Book of Memories at [www.hallfuneralhomes.com](http://www.hallfuneralhomes.com).
